subject: Horses
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: The French horse Trêve and her trainer, Criquette Head-Maarek, are aiming for a record third straight victory in the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe on Sunday.
snippet: The French horse Trêve and her trainer, Criquette Head-Maarek, are aiming for a record third straight victory in the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe on Sunday.
